about_the_game:
Unlock the full power of tanking & healing with boosts to Celeste, Nayeli, and Calliope as well as an exclusive familiar to help you!

In this pack:
- Full Uncommon Gear for Celeste, Nayeli, and Calliope
- 6 Platinum Celeste Chests
- 6 Platinum Nayeli Chests
- 6 Platinum Calliope Chests
- An Exclusive Familiar
- 10 Epic Potions of Speed
- 10 Potions of Specialization
- 3833 Platinum
detailed_description:
Unlock the full power of tanking & healing with boosts to Celeste, Nayeli, and Calliope as well as an exclusive familiar to help you!

In this pack:
- Full Uncommon Gear for Celeste, Nayeli, and Calliope
- 6 Platinum Celeste Chests
- 6 Platinum Nayeli Chests
- 6 Platinum Calliope Chests
- An Exclusive Familiar
- 10 Epic Potions of Speed
- 10 Potions of Specialization
- 3833 Platinum

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.6, and above
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz or faster processor
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, or Windows 8 Classic
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 120 MB available space
